QuestData.Title: Thinning the Horde
QuestData.Description: The Horde's numbers swell as reinforcements from Ashenvale and Azshara arrive. There is no diplomacy to be had with the beasts. This is Hellscream's Horde and Hellscream's Horde wants our blood! We will not sit idly by and allow them to take our land and kill our people. We must act!$B$BWe must thin the Horde! Consider it your daily responsibility.$B$BVenture forth into Stonetalon Mountains and slay as many of the Horde as you are able. Let them know that the Alliance will not surrender!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay any 20 soldiers of the Horde in Stonetalon Mountains.
